name: Wisp
description: A glowing spirit of nature that gathers resources and builds structures. Can detonate to dispel magic.

abilities.name: Gather
abilities.description: Gather gold or harvest lumber from trees. Wisps do not destroy trees when harvesting.

abilities.name: Build
abilities.description: Grow a living building from a seed.

abilities.name: Detonate
abilities.description: Sacrifice the Wisp to dispel all magic in an area and damage summoned units.

abilities.name: Renew
abilities.description: Channels energy to repair a building or restore mana to a unit.
